channel.title: Nex Help

item.title: Nex Help
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

I have been working on Nex for my server for a while and I want her to be able to hit through protect from melee. I am getting this error when compiling.
“Else without if” but every other case has else without if and they don’t get errors…

Here is my code.

case 13448: //Nex if (n.AttackStyle == 1) { n.animate(6987) if(p.PROTECTFROMMELEE == true) p.hit(Misc.random(15)); else p.hit(Misc.random(65)); } break;

Read full topic
